info.name: Role and Permission Collection
info.description:
API documentation for permissions, roles, users, and authentication

Contact Support:
 Name: Contact du support API,
 Email: contact@labelstrust.com

item.name: Permissions

query.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

request.description:
Retrieve a paginate list of permissions information based on certain criteria.  
This endpoint returns a subset of permission objects based on the pagination parameters provided. Each representing a specific permission with its associated details.  
Use query parameters to control the pagination behavior (e.g., page number, per page, page size, fields).

**Query Parameters:**

- **fields:** A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response. This parameter is optional.
    

The response includes information such as the total count of permissions and the permissions available on the current page.

**Response:**

- **Status Code 200:** Indicates a successful response.
- **Content Type:** application/json
- **Schema:** The response body contains a JSON object with the following properties:
    - **status:** A boolean indicating whether the request was successful.
    - **message:** Additional information about the response (nullable).
    - **data:** An object containing the retrieved permissions data, including pagination details if applicable.
        - **current_page:** The current page number.
        - **data:** An array of permissions objects.
        - **first_page_url:** The URL of the first page.
        - **from:** The index of the first item in the current page.
        - **last_page:** The index of the last item in the current page.
        - **last_page_url:** The URL of the last page.
        - **links:** An array of objects representing links to different pages.
        - **next_page_url:** The URL of the next page (nullable).
        - **path:** The path of the current page.
        - **per_page:** The total number of items available per page.
        - **prev_page_url:** The URL of the previous page (nullable).
        - **to:** The ending index of the data on the current page (nullable).
        - **total:** The total number of items.
    - **status_code:** The HTTP status code of the response.

response.name: Successfully Response

item.description:
The Permissions collection provides endpoints for retrieving permissions within the system. Permissions define the specific actions that users or roles are allowed to perform. Using the **Retrieve Permissions** endpoint, you can fetch a list of all permissions available in the system.

**Endpoints:**

- **Retrieve Permissions:** Fetch paginate list of all permissions available in the system.
    

Permissions are essential for controlling access to various functionalities and resources within your application. Ensure that permissions are properly configured and assigned to roles to enforce security policies effectively.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the role

request.description: Grant permissions access to role.
